name: Telelogic
overview: Telelogic AB provides software solutions to optimize, align, and automate business processes worldwide. Its product portfolio comprises Telelogic FOCAL POINT, a configurable Web-based decision support platform for requirements management, product management, and project portfolio management; Telelogic DOORS, for requirements management; and Telelogic SYSTEM ARCHITECT that enables users to build an integrated collection of models and documents across business, information, systems, and technology domains. The company also offers Telelogic TAU product family that automates design and development; Telelogic SYNERGY suite for task-based change management and configuration management; Telelogic LOGISCOPE, a software quality assurance tool that automates code reviews and identifies and detects error-prone modules for quality assurance and software testing; Telelogic DocExpress, a software documentation tool that enable users to interactively collect, format, and publish project documentation and technical documentation from various development tools; and Statemate, which enable engineers to rapidly design and validate complex systems level products through a combination of graphic modeling, simulation, code generation, documentation generation, and test plan definition. In addition, it provides information technology consulting services. The company serves various industries, including communications, military/aerospace, and automotive. Telelogic AB was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Malmo, Sweden.
